name: Kiss the Demiurge
description:
Kiss the Demiurge is a dramatic yuri visual novel about magic, delusions, and love.

"For the purification of humanity!"

Kiss the Demiurge follows the story of Minori Nakahashi, a mage who has been tasked by a secret society to hide magic from the world. She feels intense feelings for other girls but has sworn off of love to dedicate her life to her mission, viewing herself as little more than a tool of the secret society.

One day she discovers a ""magic club"" while investigating a high school, made up of three delusional girls who mistakenly believe themselves to have magic powers of their own. One is a shy fortune teller whose predictions always go wrong, another claims she can hear ghosts, and the leader boasts that she's descended from a clan of magic samurai.
Minori is enraged by the very concept of the club, and transfers schools to infiltrate and destroy it. But to her surprise, she slowly finds herself falling in love with the girls of the club and is forced to question her mission and ideals.

The visual novel has three romantic routes and roughly ten hours of reading. There is only one choice, so the reader can simply enjoy the story without having to worry about getting a bad ending.
